title: Restaurant Shalimar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, South Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers table d’hôte menus at lunch and supper hours on Wednesdays and lunch buffets Thursdays and Fridays. Supper buffets Thursday through Sunday evenings. Several vegan choices on menu; please inquire if any of the vegetarian dishes can be made vegan.
